title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Here are the frequently asked questions we receive. If you have a question that is not answered here, please contact us.

machine.question: What types of machines are available?
machine.answer:
We have four machines tailored for e-commerce needs: 

 • Vertical: Ideal for Ghost and Piqué packshots. 
 • Eclipse: Perfect for shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and other small to medium-sized products. It also allows for 360° video creation. 
 • Horizontal: Designed for flat lay packshots. 
 • Live: Dedicated to model photography.

operator.question: Can the machines be rented with or without an operator?
operator.answer: Yes, you can rent them independently or with the assistance of an operator.

accessibility.question: Are the machines easy to use, even without photography experience?
accessibility.answer: Yes! Our machines are intuitive and user-friendly, even for those with no photography experience. If needed, an operator can assist you.

delegation.question: Can we entrust you with our entire e-commerce shoot?
delegation.answer: Yes, with our full service, we can handle the entire process, from receiving the products to delivering the retouched files.

weekend.question: Is the studio available for booking on weekends?
weekend.answer: Yes, but only for a minimum booking of 4 hours. A 25% surcharge applies to machine and operator fees.

production.question: Do you offer full production services?
production.answer: Yes! We provide a complete range of services, including production, art buying, casting, and custom shoot organization, as well as post-production.

cyclorama.question: Do you have a cyclorama for larger productions?
cyclorama.answer: Yes, our studio features a cyclorama to accommodate traditional studio productions.

booking.question: How can I book a machine or service?
booking.answer: You can book directly through our online platform or contact us via email or phone to check availability and secure a slot.

hours.question: What are your opening hours?
hours.answer: We are open on weekdays from 10 AM to 6 PM. The studio can also open on weekends under certain conditions (see the weekend booking question).

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept bank transfers and credit card payments.
